name: rhtmlLabelUtils
description: label utilities and shared label components for rhtml packages

scripts.dist: rm -r dist/; mkdir -p dist; babel --ignore node_modules,dist,examples ./src/ -d dist
scripts.serve: rm -rf browser && mkdir -p browser && cp -r test/web_server/ browser && cp -r node_modules/d3/dist/d3.js browser/external && npm run compile_internal && serve browser -l 9000
scripts.gatherDiffs: rm -rf .tmp/diffs; mkdir -p .tmp/diffs/; for I in `find test/snapshots -type d -name __diff_output__`; do cp $I/* .tmp/diffs/ 2> /dev/null; done; true
scripts.seeDiffs: npm run gatherDiffs; npm run macOpenDiffs

author: Kyle Zeeuwen
